sentences.sContent: This plant is a vigorous grower.
sentences.sCn: 这种植物生长起来茂盛茁壮。

sentences.sContent: ...a diverse and vigorous economy attracted to the urban core has offered stable employment for residents...
...The emotional situations and moral dilemmas that are the stuff of literature are also vigorous exercise for the brain...
...This mission depends on traditions of rational discourse and vigorous defense of the scientific method...

remMethod.val: vigor(活力) ＋ ous(…的) → 有活力的 → 有力的
